splash.name: splash
splash.text:
THE ERA AND TIME OF

THIS STORY IS UNKNOWN.


AFTER THE MOTHER SHIP

"ARKANOID" WAS DESTROYED,

A SPACECRAFT "VAUS"

SCRAMBLED AWAY FROM IT.


BUT ONLY TO BE

TRAPPED IN SPACE WARPED

BY SOMEONE......

title.text:
TAITO CORPORATION 1987
      LICENSED BY
NINTENDO OF AMERICA INC.

victory.name: victory
victory.text:
DIMENSION-CONTROLLING FORT

"DOH" HAS NOW BEEN

DEMOLISHED, AND TIME

STARTED FLOWING REVERSLY.


"VAUS" MANAGED TO ESCAPE

FROM THE DISTORTED SPACE.


BUT THE REAL VOYAGE OF

"ARKANOID" IN THE GALAXY

HAS ONLY STARTED......
